review: My second chromecast.  As advertised works great.

review: Chromecast comes in a small box with simple instructions. Works perfect and with the new videostream app which you can download for free on the google app store. It is even better!

review: just what I was looking for. Thank You

review: Best $35 dollars I have spent in a long time.

review: Couldn't make it work it the extra connection cord that came with the product, had to plug it directly into the television HDMI for it to work.  Also, wished Kindle had an app for it and wished it worked for more video apps.
author: Kevin B. Kern
